column4: Would it be possible to combine several or all of the minimal install images on this site https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/MinimalCD and put them on a single CD? So I could choose which I would like to install each time I boot from the disc?
I can do that with a flash drive..  makign a dvd.. may be a little harder. :) but doable ive seen.
My PC boots up faster then my ANdroid Phone. :)
I have a Dell Poweredge 600SC (OLD) that just had its windows system partition fail during a power loss. I assume an old machine like this is going to fail in the way of usb boot support
